Class Main

    • Main

extends java.lang.Object

    Main

    This class will draw upon Coin, Hangman, and Tic_Tac_Toe

    Created: 10/27/2021

    Author:
    Rhett Boatright

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will call upon the other methods to play each separate game included.

        args - (String; placeholder for the main method.)
        choice - (int; holds the choice of the user.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • tTT

        public static void tTT()
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method will use Tic_Tac_Toe to play a game of it.
        Parameters:
        place - (int; used to determine where to place an 'x' or 'o'.)
        count - (int; used to determine if the game is a tie or not.)
        won - (String; used to tell the program to stop if there is a winner.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • hangMan

        public static void hangMan()
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will use Hangman to play a game of it.
        Parameters:
        word - (Used to hold the value of the word randomly generated.)
        wrong - (Used to see if the player has lost the game or not.)
        exit - (Used to see if the program will exit hangMan or not.)
        showToUser - (StringBuilder; used to show the user the word length and the letters guessed.)
        guess - (StringBuilder; used to check showToUser against word.)
        k - (int; used to run a for loop.)
        i - (int; used to run a for loop.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • choose

        public static java.lang.String choose​(java.io.File f)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method is called upon by hangMan to generate a random string from a text file.)
        Parameters:
        file - (File; used to locate file location.)
        rand - (Random; used to generate random string.)
        n - (int; used to locate the string from the random number generator.)
        line - (String; place holder to check to see if the number is correct.)
        result - (String; used to return the random string.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • coinFlip

        public static void coinFlip()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method will call upon Coin to flip a coin and print it to a file.
        Parameters:
        input - (String; holds the input of the player.)
        heads - (int; used to count the amount of times the coin lands on heads.)
        tails - (int; used to count the amount of times the coin lands on tails.)
        results - (int; holds the value of the flipped coin before checking the coin flip.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
